articles.title: The colloidal stability of albumin-based drug delivery systems has a profound effect on tumoricidal activity.
articles.summary: Researchers developed improved albumin-based nanoparticles with enhanced colloidal stability, leading to better drug delivery and increased tumor exposure in cancer treatment.

articles.title: Killing cancer takes guts: lessons learned from the manipulation of gut microbiome and immunotherapy for the future of urothelial carcinoma.
articles.summary: Gut microbiome manipulation shows promise in improving immunotherapy effectiveness for urothelial carcinoma by enhancing immune system response.

articles.title: Effects of estradiol, tamoxifen, and raloxifene on human temporal lobe cortex astroglial cell spreading.
articles.summary: Estradiol and related compounds significantly altered the spreading behavior of brain cells, potentially impacting neurological interactions in the cortex.
